question: Hi,I am desperate to get help for my situation.  About 4 yrs. ago, I started noticing weakness and degeneration of my calf muscles, to the point that now I have no medial muscles and my whole lower leg swells.  I have no insurance, so the local health dept. is my only option...a bad one, as they are good only at dispensing anti-depressants or giving flu shots, neither of which I subscribe to.The weakness has lead to lack of balance and tone.  I am embarrassed at how my legs look sans inner calf muscles, but more than that is the fact that I have no strength to stand for long periods of time, anymore and it actually starts to hurt with a pulling pain when I do  Coupled with that is very excruciating spasms that go from my ankle up to my inner thigh.  The only thing that quells it is a dose of Bone Up or Y Cramp, both of which have high calcium and magnesium.  I get instant relief, usually.  The cramping/spasms are so intense, tears form in my eyes.  I can barely walk to the kitchen to get the calcium pills.  i have also just noticed that these spasms seem to happen more when I have consumed SUGAR.  (don't worry, I don't use HFCS or Sucralose.)  I just occasionally have a piece of cake or cookies or dried pineapple and later in the night, I will suffer tremendous painful episodes of horrible muscle spasms that make me want to die.I have tried taking  things to build up my muscles, but so far nothing has helped.  I just bought Synthovial Seven from the health food store.  It is Hyaluronic Acid, which comprises the synovial fluid in the joints.  This cost me a fortune ($46.99) but I am so desperate for some relief.  if it works, I will happily spend that amount each month.Can anyone help me try to figure this out?I made the health dept. run some tests on me and Diabetes was ruled out.Many Thanks,Namaste,1zengirl
